revision.comment: Created page with "Possibly: A Voyage to the Cape of Good Hope, towards the Antarctic Polar Circle, and round the world: but chiefly into the country of the Hottentots and Caffres, from the ye..."
revision.text: Possibly: A Voyage to the Cape of Good Hope, towards the Antarctic Polar Circle, and round the world: but chiefly into the country of the Hottentots and Caffres, from the year 1772, to 1776. By Andrew Sparrman, M.D. Professor of Physic at Stockholm, Fellow of the Royal Academy of Sciences in Sweden, and inspector of its cabinet of natural history. Translated from the Swedish original. With Plates. In Two Volumes. (London : Printed for G. G. J. and J. Robinson, Pater-Noster-Row, MDCCLXXXVI. [1786]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2511792~S1
